titles.title: Fort Peck Indian Tribes-Montana Compact Act of 1994
A bill to ratify a compact between the Assiniboine and Sioux Indian Tribes of the Fort Peck Reservation and the State of Montana.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2502)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/8/1994--Introduced. Fort Peck Indian Tribes-Montana Compact Act of 1994 - Ratifies the Fort Peck Indian Tribes-Montana Compact. Authorizes the Tribes (the Assiniboine and Sioux Tribes of the Fort Peck Indian Reservation) to enter into a Water Agreement.
